    XDAG: A new DAG-based cryptocurrency

    XDAG is a novel application of Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) technology that solves the issues currently facing blockchain technology.

    The first mineable DAG

    Block = transaction = address
    Original main chain idea
    Mining new money every 64 seconds

    No pre-mine or ICO

    XDAG offer bleeding edge technology to offer a decentralised solution to the problems facing other cryptocurrencies. XDAG has no pre-mine or ICO, and is a true community-driven project aligned by a common goal and innovative development team.

    Previous Next

    About Dagger

    Dagger is part of a new wave of Distributed Ledger projects based on a DAG infrastructure. DAG, or Directed acyclic graph, is an alternative method for sending data amongst people within a distributed, decentralized environment. This is done without a blockchain, allowing for greater scalability.

    CPU/GPU Mineable

    XDAG is both CPU & GPU mineable. Making it the first mineable DAG project.

    Privacy

    XDAG is working on incorporating privacy features. These are part of the 2018 roadmap.

    Smart contracts

    XDAG is researching the possibility to add smart contract functionality.

    Mining quick start

    The first mineable DAG. Follow the steps below. If you get stuck, check out our social channels for help, specifically Discord.

    Download wallet

    First, download the Dagger miner & wallet suitable for your operating system. Click to download.

    Learn about the process

    Next watch the easy to follow video setup guide.

    Select a pool

    You can connect to a featured pool or visit our wiki for a complete list of approved pools.

    Software

    Download links for applications that interact with the XDAG network.

    Windows 64-bit wallet

    64 bit Windows Console and GUI executables (x64).

    Windows 32-bit wallet

    32 bit Windows Console and GUI executables (x86).

    Windows GPU miner

    GPU miner by Jonano for Windows (x64).

    MacOS wallet

    MacOS command line wallet.

    MacOS GPU miner

    GPU Miner by Jonano for MacOS.

    Android wallet

    For Android 5.0 and newer.

    Roadmap

    1. Q3 2017
    2. Q1 2018
    3. Q2 2018
    4. Q3 2018
    5. Future
    1. December 2017
      • CLI for Windows and Linux
      • Miner, full node and pool release
      • Testnet launch
    2. January 2018
      • Mainnet launch
      • GUI wallet with integrated miner for Windows
      February 2018
      • Community built a block explorer based on original developers code
      • Original developer gives the ownership of the project to the community
      • Xdag.org is fully operational
      • The original code is being cleaned
      March 2018
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.0
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.1 with MAC support
      • Brand new website for our new domain xdag.io
    3. May 2018
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.2
      • XDAG gets listed on the bbx.com cryptocurrency exchange
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.3
      June 2018
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.4
    4. July 2018
      • Release of XDAG wallet 0.2.5 with major performance improvements
      • GPU Miner 0.3.0 release with MAC support
      • Block explorer visual and performance update
      August 2018
      • Release of XDAG Android and iOS wallets
    5. ETA 2018
      • After a wallet RPC is created, the community will push for exchange listing
      Future plans
      • Expansion of the development team
      • Social media and marketing
